00054 // Additional control types that Studio uses:
00055 
00056 // ------ ComplexControls
00057 
00058 #define DZ_CC_NumericSlider         ((QStyle::ComplexControl)( QStyle::CC_CustomBase + 0 ))
00059 #define DZ_CC_DividerBar            ((QStyle::ComplexControl)( QStyle::CC_CustomBase + 1 ))
00060 #define DZ_CC_MouseOverSlider       ((QStyle::ComplexControl)( QStyle::CC_CustomBase + 2 )) // make obsolete?
00061 #define DZ_CC_StyledNumericSlider   ((QStyle::ComplexControl)( QStyle::CC_CustomBase + 3 ))
00062 
00063 // total number of custom complex control items
00064 #define DZ_CC_NumItems      4
00065 
00066 // ------ SubControls
00067 
00068 // Numeric Slider and MouseOver Slider
00069 #define DZ_SC_SliderBar             ((QStyle::SubControl)0x00000001)
00070 #define DZ_SC_SliderLeftNudge       ((QStyle::SubControl)0x00000002)
00071 #define DZ_SC_SliderRightNudge      ((QStyle::SubControl)0x00000004)
00072 #define DZ_SC_SliderTextArea        ((QStyle::SubControl)0x00000008)
00073 #define DZ_SC_SliderEditArea        ((QStyle::SubControl)0x00000010)
00074 #define DZ_SC_SliderLabelArea       ((QStyle::SubControl)0x00000020)
00075 #define DZ_SC_SliderIndicator       ((QStyle::SubControl)0x00000040)
00076 
00077 // Divider Bar
00078 #define DZ_SC_DividerGrip           ((QStyle::SubControl)0x00000001)
00079 
00080 // ------ ControlElements
00081 #define DZ_CE_TabOptionsButton      QStyle::CE_CustomBase
00082 #define DZ_CE_DockWindowTitleBar    ((QStyle::ControlElement)( QStyle::CE_CustomBase + 1 ))
00083 #define DZ_CE_WidgetGroupBar        ((QStyle::ControlElement)( QStyle::CE_CustomBase + 2 ))
00084 #define DZ_CE_AHButton              ((QStyle::ControlElement)( QStyle::CE_CustomBase + 3 )) // make obsolete?
00085 #define DZ_CE_AHUpButton            ((QStyle::ControlElement)( QStyle::CE_CustomBase + 4 )) // make obsolete?
00086 #define DZ_CE_AHDnButton            ((QStyle::ControlElement)( QStyle::CE_CustomBase + 5 )) // make obsolete?
00087 #define DZ_CE_AHRButton             ((QStyle::ControlElement)( QStyle::CE_CustomBase + 6 )) // make obsolete?
00088 #define DZ_CE_AHLButton             ((QStyle::ControlElement)( QStyle::CE_CustomBase + 7 )) // make obsolete?
00089 
00090 // total number of custom primitive element items
00091 #define DZ_CE_NumItems      8
00092 
00093 // Use the platform-specific style as the base for our style.
00094 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN
00095 typedef QWindowsStyle DZ_SYSTEM_STYLE;
00096 #elif defined Q_OS_MAC
00097 // Use QWindowsStyle style even on Mac to avoid special handling of button "hit" sizes in QPushButtton code.
00098 // We don't really get anything from the Mac style anymore anyway.
00099 typedef QWindowsStyle DZ_SYSTEM_STYLE;
00100 #endif
00101 
00102 inline QRect DzShrinkRect(QRect const &rect, int amount)
00103 {
00104     return rect.adjusted(amount, amount, -amount, -amount);
00105 }

00154 class DzStyleInterface
00155 {
00156 public:
00157     enum TextStyle
00158     {
00159         TS_Default,
00160         TS_ButtonCommand,
00161         TS_ButtonDefault,
00162         TS_TabBarTab,
00163         TS_ProgressBar,
00164         TS_MenuBarItem,
00165         TS_PopupMenuItem,
00166         TS_ListViewItem,
00167         // do not add any values below/greater than this
00168         TS_CustomBase =     0xf0000000
00169     };
00170 
00171     virtual ~DzStyleInterface() { }
00172 
00173     virtual QRect       commonStyleSubElementRect( QStyle::SubElement subElement,
00174                             const QStyleOption *option, QWidget const *widget ) const = 0;
00175     virtual QRect       systemStyleSubElementRect( QStyle::SubElement subElement,
00176                             const QStyleOption *option, QWidget const *widget ) const = 0;
00177     virtual DzTextStyle textStyle( TextStyle ts, const QStyleOption *option, QWidget const *widget = 0 ) const = 0;
00178     virtual void        drawPrimitive( QStyle::PrimitiveElement pe, const QStyleOption *opt, QPainter *p, QWidget const *w = 0 ) const = 0;
00179     virtual QSize       systemStyleSizeFromContents( QStyle::ContentsType ct,
00180                             const QStyleOption *opt, const QSize &contentsSize, const QWidget *widget ) const = 0;
00181 };
